img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game where a player character is engaged in combat with an enemy named Kang Jin-Sim. The battle takes place in a snowy mountainous landscape, with the player character wielding a glowing staff. The interface displays various icons and a health bar at the bottom of the screen, indicating the player's status and available actions. The scene is dynamic, with visual effects such as sparks and energy surrounding the characters, suggesting an intense battle.
